shr Reference Model Version 1.0.0
obf

Group UseContext

Documentation:

The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, …) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, …) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate questionnaire instances.

Ancestors:
  • UseContext
Used By:
  • Questionnaire, 
  • ValueSet

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      Code

      The main type identifier for a lab, procedure, condition, etc., usually drawn from a controlled vocabulary.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Code
      1..1
      ContextValue

      A value that defines the context specified in this context of use. The interpretation of the value is defined by the code.
      DataType
      Cardinality
